txt.en: Was it some queer whim of nature that created the wood-trolls or the mocking hand of a great and terrible evil? Whatever the truth of it, it is certain that the River Hobbits of Misthallow shall remain vigilant and toil endlessly to protect the forests and woodlands of Middle-earth.

Many are the tales of the wood-demons of the North, who spread like a festering disease through the Greenwood of old. Rumours tell that others alike to their kind have appeared in lands far beyond the bounds of Mirkwood and the Wells of Langflood, and many among the River Hobbits of Misthallow now believe that nature itself is being corrupted by some unseen hand.

Wolves? Orcs? Dark Powers? Well, if that is what is meant to be, then that is what will beâ€”but you have got mettle enough to see it through, and you wager that any would-be Lord of Gundabad or self-styled Dark Lord will get a fair bit more than he bargained for if he sets his eyes on the hardy River Hobbits of Misthallow.
